paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the weighted composition operators T psi,phi f = psi f o phi between mu-Bloch type spaces on the polydisc of C-n. For normal functions mu and omega on [0,1), we characterize the boundedness and the compactness of T-psi,T-phi: B-mu(D-n) -> B-omega(D-n) (respectively, B-mu,B-0(D-n) -> B-omega,B-0(D-n)).
paper_title: Weighted composition operators between mu-Bloch type spaces on the polydisc of C-n
